By contrast, Industrial Products’ sales have plateaued, suggesting limited upside from an R&D infusion alone.
second_reasoning: We’ll allocate eight million to Consumer Products under a three-stage gate structure to ensure they deliver a clear feature set, working prototype, and pilot results before drawing each tranche.
